group.name: itsp-account
group.label: ITSP Account
group.description: The information that is specific to a given ITSP account.

setting.name: proxy-domain
setting.label: ITSP server domain name
setting.description: The domain name of the ITSP. This domain name is used to look up via DNS SRV the address of the SIP server the ITSP uses. If the ITSP does not provide this lookup mechanism specify a server address below.

setting.name: user-name
setting.label: User name
setting.description: The authentication user name attached to the account.

setting.name: outbound-proxy
setting.label: ITSP server address
setting.description: If the ITSP specifies a server address or name or an outbound proxy, enter it here. If nothing is specified, the route to the ITSP's server (outbound proxy) is determined by DNS lookup on the ITSP domain.

setting.name: inbound-proxy
setting.label: Inbound ITSP server address
setting.description: If the ITSP specifies an inbound proxy or server that is different from the ITSP server address or outbound proxy above, enter it here. Otherwise this setting is assumed to be identical to the ITSP server or outbound proxy.

setting.name: use-global-addressing
setting.label: Use public address for call setup
setting.description: If checked, use the sipXbridge public address for SIP signaling and media (SDP). Otherwise, the local (LAN) address will be used. Using the local address assumes that the ITSP provides NAT traversal functionality.

setting.name: use-rport
setting.label: Set RPort Parameter
setting.description: If checked then the rport parameter will be set in outbound SIP requests; thus indicating to the ITSP server that the SIP request is originating from behind a Symmetric NAT and that the server should respond to the remote address and port of the incoming signaling as defined in RFC 3581.

setting.name: register-on-initialization
setting.label: Register on initialization
setting.description: Defines whether or not to register with the given ITSP on initialization.

setting.name: outbound-registrar
setting.label: Registrar address
setting.description: Registrar address (if different from ITSP server address). Determines where to send REGISTER request.

setting.name: use-registration-for-caller-id
setting.label: Use Registration for caller-ID
setting.description: Defines whether or not to use the ITSP's registration user name and domain as caller ID as required by some ITSPs. If not set, the user can specify a desired caller-ID for the ITSP account under the Caller-ID tab.

setting.name: sip-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for SIP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the mechanism to use for SIP keepalive. If nothing is specified, CR-LF (empty SIP message) is used.

setting.name: rtp-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for RTP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the mechanism to use for media (RTP) keepalive.
